api_list.name: Get categories
api_list.description: Get all possible categories of companies in database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://lithuania-companies-database.p.rapidapi.com/allCategories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lithuania-companies-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://lithuania-companies-database.p.rapidapi.com/allCategories"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "lithuania-companies-database.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
